title: border-inline
description: The `border-inline` CSS property sets the border for the inline-start and inline-end sides of an element.
content: The property that sets the border on the inline-start and inline-end sides of an element, which correspond to the left and right sides in a horizontal writing mode. It's a shorthand for `border-inline-start` and `border-inline-end`, useful for styling borders on inline sides.
